page.title: 08STANWICK
page.content: {STANWICK MANOR. The manor is beautifully made. The front is 13th century.It is made of stone and has old wooden doors.Most of the windows are arched but at the front wall there are large windows.The manor has some fancy stone work and on one of the walls there is a wooden cross.The avenue where the manor stands used to be an old dirt track until 17 years ago now there are new houses. There is a passage from the manor to the church.{ {STANWICK CHURCH. The church is the only building in the village from the Middle Ages.The church is Norman and it was dedicated to St.Lawrence.The church has been rebuilt once in the 13th century. The tower is the best feature.
